phs000888.v1.p-DDtoCUI (http://ddent.ncpi.someplace.org/ddent-fhir/ConceptMap/DD/phs000888.v1.p1-DDtoCUI)

Mapping from http://ddent.ncpi.someplace.org/ddent-fhir/ValueSet/DD/phs000888.v1.p1 to http://ddent.ncpi.someplace.org/ddent-fhir/ValueSet/CUI/phs000888.v1.p1

The electronic Medical Records and Genomics (eMERGE) Network is a consortium of ten participating sites
